tool_description: Performs batch operations on multiple assets including bulk updates, transformations, and management tasks.

asset_ids.description: List of asset identifiers to process

operation.description: Batch operation: resize, convert, delete, update_metadata, or validate

batch_size.description: Number of assets to process simultaneously

continue_on_error.description: Whether to continue processing if individual assets fail

error_messages: Empty asset list: asset_ids cannot be empty and must contain valid asset identifiers.
Invalid operation: operation must be one of [resize, convert, delete, update_metadata, validate].
Batch size out of range: batch_size must be between 1 and 100.
Invalid email format: notification_email must be a valid email address or null.
Operation parameters invalid: Check operation_params format - should be key=value pairs.
usage: Provide list of asset IDs and specify the operation to perform. Use operation_params for operation-specific settings.

job_id.description: Unique identifier for the batch job

total_assets.description: Total number of assets to process

failed_count.description: Number of assets that failed processing

status.description: Current job status: queued, processing, completed, or failed

estimated_completion.description: Estimated completion time in ISO 8601 format
